In England, in the seven days to 16 January, there were 550,099 new confirmed cases (972.8 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 09 January, there were 905,236 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 39% (355,137 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 21 January is 13,341,488 (23,592.3 cases per 100,000 population).
